title: My truth
creator_credit: Vladimir Keca, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Vladimir Keca lived a sheltered life in a remote part of the former Yugoslavia with his grandparents. But once war broke out, he was removed from his comfort zone and, while it changed everything, Keca is not so sure that it was all bad.
